term.title: analytical selectivity

item.text: Selectivity of a measuring system in analytical chemistry.

notes.item: Selectivity should be qualified by "analytical" if there is potential confusion with selectivity in catalysis or in organic reaction mechanisms.

sources.item: PAC, 2021, 93, 997. 'Metrological and quality concepts in analytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 2021)' on page 1019 (https://doi.org/10.1515/pac-2019-0819)
